name: Guess the Number (Dante55channel)
description:
This is the game where you think of number between 1 and 1000 and computer tries to guess that number randomly. If the number on screen is lower than your number you can press "it's higher" button so that computer goes to higher number and if it is higher than your number you can press "it's lower button" so that it goes to lower number. There is also a counter.

This is my first game ever made in Unity.
